TopicTitle: What is the purpose of OneNote 2013?

Articles.Content:
I bught office 365 for student with 4 years subscription.

Price as for Polish conditions was a big 300 zÃ…â€š, but at least I have all Office programs. Which is nice.

I could not afford to buy the standard Office 2013 professional which costs 1,100 zÃ…â€š

Fortunately, I am a student and I have cheaper is good to be a student: D

I know more or less what it does most of the programs, I have some problems with Access so I borrowed a book from the university library. But I still do not know what is the use OneNote?

Word - is used to write

Excel - spreadsheets and calculations

PowerPoint - presentation

Access - database

Outlook - mail client

OneNote -???
OneNote is a note making tool. You can use it in class to take notes, for example, or put together a project using it. Its quite useful for things like that. Think evernote, only more Microsoft-y.

OneNote is a note making tool. You can use it in class to take notes, for example, or put together a project using it. Its quite useful for things like that. Think evernote, only more Microsoft-y.

Thanks very much :-)

If you're a student, you might want to see if your school is a member of MSDNAA, which provides free Microsoft software to students of member schools. I got Windows 7 for free after my hard drive crashed this way
